post.content:
Web Designer/Web Developer :.

Status:  Full Time, Employee        

Job Location: Richmond Hill  

Web Developer/Web Design

Status: Full-time
Location: Richmond Hill
Department: Information Technology
Qualifications:
Web site Design and Developing experience
Excellent HTML skills
Strong knowledge of ASP, SQL, VB and JavaScript
Hands on experience in Adobe Photoshop and web graphics
knowledge of TCP/IP
Team player
Self-motivated
Excellent communication skills

Software Skills:

Home Site, MS-SQL, ASP, HTML 4.0, Adobe Photo Shop, Corel Draw, Adobe Illustrator and Microsoft Office.

Please Email John Sharrif at john@goldline.net
post.title: Web Designer/Web Developer
